# contentful_locale (Resource)

A Contentful Locale represents a language and region combination.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "contentful_locale" "example_locale" {
  space_id = "spaced-id"

  name          = "locale-name"
  code          = "de"
  fallback_code = "en-US"
  optional      = false
  cda           = false
  cma           = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `code` (String)
- `name` (String)
- `space_id` (String)

### Optional

- `cda` (Boolean)
- `cma` (Boolean)
- `fallback_code` (String)
- `optional` (Boolean)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `version` (Number)
